siteMetaDescription:
关于 Hello，欢迎访问我的博客。

5年前端，坐标成都。不装不水，用最易懂的方式分享技术文章。

欢迎通过以下任一平台订阅我的博客：

 Github
 知乎 
 微信订阅号：搜索“苏溪云的博客”或扫描... (苏溪云的博客)
title: about
text:
const layoutProps = {
  
};
class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Hello，欢迎访问我的博客。`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`5年前端，坐标成都。不装不水，用最易懂的方式分享技术文章。`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`欢迎通过以下任一平台订阅我的博客：`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://github.com/Terry-Su/blogs-cn"}}>{`Github`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/su-xi-yun"}}>{`知乎`}</MDXTag>{` `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`微信订阅号：搜索“苏溪云的博客”或扫描下方二维码`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23733477/77869172-2459f400-7270-11ea-8a84-d5d63a426c19.png","alt":"微信订阅号：苏溪云的博客"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://juejin.im/user/5ba30d54f265da0aec2255ca/posts"}}>{`掘金`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://segmentfault.com/u/terry_su/articles"}}>{`思否`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`联系方式`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`邮箱： `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"theterrysu@163.com"}}>{`theterrysu@163.com`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
render( <MDXContent /> )

texts.siteMetaDescription: 苏溪云的原创前端技术博客 4年前端 分享主流前端技术 JavaScript ReactJS
